channel.title: Ice Barrage (click me)
channel.description:
Okay, i have been wanting to fix this very dumb problem for a long time, my ice barrage doesnt freeze correctly, well it does but it doesnt...
For example, if i ice barrage someone and they right click my and click follow, they can just follow right up to the player and it totally ignores the barrage...
So if there is anything i need to add or remove, let me know what it is, thanks!!
Edit: If you help me i can't promise you rep+, i cant promise you money, but i can promise you Love.
~Greg

item.title: Ice Barrage (click me)
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You should most probably have to add something in your player following method.

Find it and if you know what your are doing have it do a check to see if you are currently frozen, if so, follow = false.

Something like that.

Read full topic
